masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"The reindeer were practicing their formation flying and Blitzen got spooked by a drone! The whole team scattered and crashed into the city's main power substation. We've got a blackout spreading across downtown and eight panicking magical reindeer tangled in power lines!"

Requirements

  • Free the reindeer from the power lines safely
  • Restore power before the hospitals switch to backup
  • Calm the reindeerâ€”they're magical and scared
